SEARCH
Package gw.plugin.policy.refresh

Class PolicyRefreshPluginBase

java.lang.Object
gw.plugin.policy.refresh.PolicyRefreshPluginBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
InternalPlugin, IPolicyRefreshPlugin, Remote
public abstract class PolicyRefreshPluginBase extends Object implements IPolicyRefreshPlugin
Base implementation of policy refresh plugin that provides the out of box functionality. Most customers are expected to extend this base class. In general they have 3 options:
  • Take the base class unchanged and just specify the appropriately customized PolicyRefreshConfiguration object to change the most commonly customized parts of the system, such as EntityMatchers or the tree used in the UI.
  • Take the base class with a customized PolicyRefreshConfiguration but then override one or more of the plugin operations with their own implementation
  • Re-implement the interface from scratch (for experts only...)

  • Method Details

    • compare

      public PolicyComparison compare(Policy existingPolicy, Policy newPolicy)
      Compares the two policies. If the ContactPreservingFilter is being used, any Contacts moved to former policy roles will be matched if there are corresponding Contacts in the "added" set.
      Specified by:
      compare in interface IPolicyRefreshPlugin
      Parameters:
      existingPolicy - The existing policy
      newPolicy - The policy retrieved from the policy search
      Returns:
      The policy comparison; if QueryableBeanComparison.hasDifferences() returns false on the result, no further refresh steps are taken
      See Also:
      • IPolicySearchAdapter.retrievePolicyFromPolicy(entity.Policy)

    • getDisplay

      public PolicyRefreshUI getDisplay(PolicyComparison comparison)
      Returns the UI builder for Policy Refresh.
      Specified by:
      getDisplay in interface IPolicyRefreshPlugin
      Parameters:
      comparison - the policy comparison
      Returns:
      The object used to build the Policy Refresh wizard UI

    • relink

      public void relink(Set<RelinkBean<KeyableBean>> toBeRelinked, RelinkContext relinkContext)
      Disconnects links between the claim graph and old policy graph and reconstructs them between the claim graph and new policy graph.
      Specified by:
      relink in interface IPolicyRefreshPlugin
      Parameters:
      toBeRelinked - The set of non-Policy entities that currently are linked to the old Policy
      relinkContext - The policy relinking context

    • removeOldPolicy

      public void removeOldPolicy(Set<KeyableBean> policyBeansToRemove)
      This implementation deletes the old policy entities. The purge is done to ensure compatibility with archiving.
      Specified by:
      removeOldPolicy in interface IPolicyRefreshPlugin
      Parameters:
      policyBeansToRemove - The set of policy-only beans from the old policy
